title: RVNL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 29 Manager and Other Posts
description: The Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 29 Manager, Senior Deputy General Manager, Deputy Manager, and Assistant Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics Engineering can apply for the RVNL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline...
